name: Collaborative Portfolio Studio
tagline: AI-assisted portfolio customization across leading copilots.
description: Designed a portfolio build system that choreographs Claude Code, Codex, AMP, and Gemini to generate tailored sections, motion concepts, and copy variations driven by prospect personas.
highlight: Cut portfolio refresh cycles from days to hours by unifying multiple AI copilots into a single creative workflow.

name: Multi-Provider Checkout
tagline: Rebuilt payment form architecture to flex across providers.
description: Refactored the checkout experience into a provider-agnostic orchestration layer with swappable UI modules and validation flows for Stripe, Braintree, and regional PSPs.
highlight: Unlocked rapid onboarding of new payment partners while lifting conversion through localized form variants.

name: Signals Pulseboard
tagline: Automated market briefings powered by n8n and AI summarization.
description: Built an n8n pipeline that aggregates news across finance feeds, enriches items with sentiment analysis, prompts a custom LLM agent for trading insights, and delivers summaries to a Telegram bot for the team.
highlight: Delivered daily multi-source insights with explainable AI notes, pushed via Telegram alerts, saving analysts two hours of manual research per session.

name: Amino Device SDK Toolkit
tagline: Developer tools for set-top box partners and vendors.
description: Delivered a bundle of JavaScript SDKs, UI scaffolds, and integration recipes that abstract hardware quirks and playback pipelines so operator partners can ship Amino OS apps faster.
highlight: Reduced partner integration time from weeks to days by automating device capability checks and providing drop-in UX components. Achieved a 78% reduction in Amino OS memory footprint by trimming legacy playback modules.

name: SDK Companion for VS Code
tagline: IntelliSense-like guidance sourced from a minified partner SDK.
description: Engineered a VS Code extension that ingests a minified JavaScript SDK, reconstructs usable metadata, and surfaces inline suggestions, signature help, and usage snippets for partner developers.
highlight: Cut onboarding time for integrators by packaging hidden SDK behaviors into contextual editor assistance.

name: Hospital Asset Management System
tagline: Asset lifecycle management tailored for clinical facilities.
description: Delivered a web platform that tracks medical equipment inventory, schedules preventative maintenance, and automates replacement tasks with vendor coordination workflows.
highlight: Improved audit readiness and reduced emergency downtime by orchestrating maintenance and replacement schedules from a single command center.

name: Dec Future Delivery Cadence
tagline: Lightweight product operations for a remote SaaS team.
description: Implemented an adaptive delivery playbook—blending roadmap shaping, weekly prioritization, and async rituals—to knit product, design, and platform stakeholders into a predictable shipping rhythm.
highlight: Cut discovery-to-release cycles by 35% while increasing cross-team satisfaction scores through clearer ownership and rollout comms.
